s: Hank Sauce is an alternative to boring pepper sauce. It may not burn a hole in your tongue, but don't be surprised when you burn through the bottle!

Hank Sauce is an alternative to boring pepper sauce. A hot sauce with a flavorful blend of fresh herbs and mild heat. The smooth flavor heats up shortly after consumption creating a wild ride for the taste buds. Fresh minced herbs add a distinct flavor unlike any other hot sauce.
